subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: The Yankees became the first team in major league history to hit three grand slams in a game, just one of several notable occurrences in a wild and rainy contest at Yankee Stadium.
snippet: The Yankees became the first team in major league history to hit three grand slams in a game, just one of several notable occurrences in a wild and rainy contest at Yankee Stadium.
